verses.roman:
tabe se hiraṇya-dāsa nija ghare āila
sei brāhmaṇe nija dvāra-mānā kaila

synonyms: tabe—thereupon; se—that; hiraṇya-dāsa—Hiraṇya Majumadāra; nija—own; ghare—to home; āila—returned; sei—that; brāhmaṇe—to Gopāla Cakravartī; nija—own; dvāra—door; mānā—prohibition; kaila—issued.
translation: Then Hiraṇya dāsa Majumadāra returned to his home and ordered that Gopāla Cakravartī not be admitted therein.
